item.title: SciTail
item.description: SciTail 论文 Khot, Tushar, Ashish Sabharwal, and Peter Clark. “Scitail: A textual entailment dataset from science question answering.” Thirty-Second AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence. 2018. 数据集 首个完全从已存在的句子中产生的数据集。 以往

item.title: SNLI
item.description: SNLI数据集 论文 Samuel R. Bowman, Gabor Angeli, Christopher Potts, and Christopher D. Manning. 2015. A large annotated corpus for learning natural language inference. In Proceedings of the 2015 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP). [pdf] [bib] 数据集构
